SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: For creating an invoice with a new line item
For editing an existing line item. (note specifying an itemid)
For deleting a line item from the invoice.(note specifying an item id and setting qty to zero)

PLACEHOLDERS.NAME: invoiceID
PLACEHOLDERS.DESCRIPTION: The invoiceID to retrieve. Note that this is NOT the same as the invoice number

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional.The contactID for invoice contact

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Invoice item(s) data in json format

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.DESCRIPTION
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The item description

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.QTY
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional for PUT(edit) only.Item Quantity. Must be greater than zero. If QTY is zero and an ITEMID is defined then the line item matching that ITEMID is removed from the invoice.

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.ITEMCODE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The item code associated with this line item.

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.FINANCECODE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The finance code to associate with the line-item.

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.TAXPERCENT
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The amount of GST on that item ten percent would be: 10

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.UNITPRICEGROSS
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The gross price for a single quantity of the item. Fifteen Dollars Ninety Six Cents would be: 15.96

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.DOMAINID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The system-id of the domain that is to be associated with the line-item.

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.PARTID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional for PUT(edit).Part ID for invoice item

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.ITEMCODE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional for PUT(edit).The item code associated with this line item.

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.COSTCENTRECODE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The cost center that is associated with the line-item.

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.DATA
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional for PUT(edit).Invoice item data

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.SERVICEDATE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The service date associated with the line-item. Supported Formats are: {ts 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss'} or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.ITEMID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: To edit an existing line item the ITEMID must be specified, for a new line item this value can be omitted or set to zero. Note: If an ITEMID is specified and QTY is set to zero then that line item is deleted from the invoice.

PARAMETERS.NAME: aItem.CHILDREN
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional for PUT(edit).Invoic children structure

PARAMETERS.NAME: surname
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Last Names person invoice bill to

PARAMETERS.NAME: firstname
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Given Names person invoice bill to

PARAMETERS.NAME: ADDRESS2
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address line 2

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPLASTNAME
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Last Names of person on a shipping address

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPFIRSTNAME
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Given Names of person on a shipping address

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPHOUSENR
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. House number of a shipping address

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPPOSTCODE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Post code of a shipping address

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPADDRESS2
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address line 2 of a shipping address

PARAMETERS.NAME: COMMENT
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Comment text

PARAMETERS.NAME: STREET
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Street name

PARAMETERS.NAME: INVOICEDATE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Invoice date yyyy-mm-dd

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPSTATE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. State of a shipping address

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPSTREET
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address Street Name

PARAMETERS.NAME: HOUSENR
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address house number

PARAMETERS.NAME: ORDERDATE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Order date yyyy-mm-dd

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPCITY
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. City name on a shipping address

PARAMETERS.NAME: SHIPCOUNTRYISO3166
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Ship Country ISO 3166 code

PARAMETERS.NAME: COUNTRYISO3166
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Country ISO 3166 code

PARAMETERS.NAME: STATE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address State

PARAMETERS.NAME: COUNTRY
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address Country code

PARAMETERS.NAME: CITY
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address City

PARAMETERS.NAME: POSTCODE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Address Post Code

PARAMETERS.NAME: PHONENR
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Phone number

PARAMETERS.NAME: ORDERNR
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Order number

PARAMETERS.NAME: EXTERNALREFERENCE
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. External Reference Key (60 characters max)

PARAMETERS.NAME: ORGID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional.Organisation ID code

PARAMETERS.NAME: email
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional. Email address

PARAMETERS.NAME: includeEnrolmentData
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Optional for GET. If a line item is linked to an enrolment, include those details with the line item response.

DESCRIPTION:
Get the details of an invoice / Update an invoice
The general process for creating the expected payload of the AITEM field is as follows:
  • Create an array of line items. Depending on the programming language that would be a structs / dictionary / hashmap).
  • Serialize the array to JSON.
  • Pass the serialised string in the AITEM form field.
